name: Navut Inc
description: Provider of an online search platform intended to bridge the gap between home discovery and financing. The company's platform offers a social hub to simplify the home buying process by integrating mortgage and real estate into one seamless service, enabling mortgage lenders to better understand their clients, save on customer acquisition costs, and offer a complete home buying experience
